definitions.definition: Any of various grazing waterfowl of the family Anatidae , which have feathers and webbed feet and are capable of flying, swimming, and walking on land, and which are bigger than ducks .
examples: There is a flock of geese on the pond.

definitions.definition: The flesh of the goose used as food.
A tailor's iron , heated in live coals or embers, used to press fabrics.
An old English board game in which players moved counters along a board, earning a double move when they reached the picture of a goose.

main_definition: Any of various grazing waterfowl of the family Anatidae , which have feathers and webbed feet and are capable of flying, swimming, and walking on land, and which are bigger than ducks .
secondary_definitions: The flesh of the goose used as food.
( slang , plural geese or gooses ) A silly person.
( archaic ) A tailor's iron , heated in live coals or embers, used to press fabrics.
( South Africa , slang , dated ) A young woman or girlfriend .
( uncountable , historical ) An old English board game in which players moved counters along a board, earning a double move when they reached the picture of a goose.
